article: faced with a populist shiite cleric who has bunkered a heavily armed militia force in the sect 's holiest shrine , u.s. commanders in this city of ###,### resorted reluctantly on thursday to a scaled-down objective , throwing a wide cordon of troops and armor around the city 's heart and announcing that they planned to `` further isolate '' the militiamen .
abstract: u.s. switches tactic in najaf trying isolation
